mapper.select: SELECT code, desc1 name, cmpcode,enddate from tmaster m join (select apps from taqtuser where usrid = #{uid}) u where m.appid rlike u.apps
SELECT a.*, a.desc1 name, 0 as chk from tmaster a
{call your_procedure_name(#{param1, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param2, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=java.lang.Integer})}
